reviews.review_msg: Just recently decided to share my personal experiences from taking this class from a while ago. Very tough teacher when it comes to grading. Did not have a nice time in the class
Took the course in Summer 2021. Would not recommend to take classes this prof teaches.

Very strict Prof who will give you a failing grade for contribution to group assignments just because you used a reference she doesn't like, even though you spent hours contributing to the group assignment with writing and editing.

For a class that only require 45 credits to take, her expectations from students are way too high. Took the course as a GPA booster to fulfill my upper division elective requirement but almost ended up failing due to her bizarre ways of marking. Would not recommend to take this course if she is teaching it unless absolutely have to.

Probably the worst Profs I have had in my years at the school. Completed destroyed my interest in learning nutrition. When a prof uses words like "garbage resources" as a way to mock the class for their poor choice of resource in the assignment, you know you have taken the wrong class.
TOUGH GRADER, if you fail the final exam,  you fail the course no matter how well  you did on all the other assignments. And she gives lots of works to do. Not recommended.
